features: 5 LEDs for process and alarm indication

product_properties.description: Belclene 200 is the most effective calcium carbonate antiscalant for high hardness, high alkalinity, and high temperature cooling water systems.
benefits: Effective in severe service conditions
FDA approved for sugar and beet processing
Kosher certified

physical_properties.appearance: Clear to slightly turbid amber liquid

product_properties.description: Belclene 220 is a phosphono polycarboxylic acid homopolymer in aqueous solution used for ferrous metal corrosion inhibition and calcium carbonate deposit control.
benefits: Effective in severe service conditions
Control calcium carbonate scale in high hardness, high alkalinity, and high temperatures

product_properties.description: Belclene 245 is a halogen tolerant maleic polymer providing excellent calcium carbonate and calcium sulfate inhibition in cooling water systems.
benefits: Superior performance for crystal growth blocking
Greater efficiency by operating at higher cycles of concentration

physical_properties.appearance: Clear to slightly turbid amber liquid

product_properties.description: Belclene 283 is a cost-effective alternative to polyacrylate-based calcium carbonate antiscalants for low to moderate LSI cooling applications.
benefits: Superior performance in cooling water formulations
FDA approval for non-contact cooling and retort waters
Halogen stability

physical_properties.appearance: Clear to slightly turbid amber liquid

product_properties.description: Belclene 287 is designed for formulators seeking a highly effective alternative to polyacrylate-based calcium carbonate antiscalants for Kraft pulp operations.
applications: Calcium carbonate scale inhibition in Kraft pulp digesters
Exceptional control of calcium carbonate and oxalate deposition
benefits: Reduced plant shutdowns for cleaning
Prolonged heater life and less corrosion

product_properties.description: Belclene 400 provides flexibility in developing phosphonate-based corrosion control formulations for cooling water, process water, and similar applications.
benefits: Effective for general calcium phosphate and calcium carbonate fouling
Building block to improve the performance of various water treatment formulations

product_properties.description: Belclene 440 is a unique combination of polymer and phosphonate in one molecule, providing improved flexibility and cost-effectiveness for water treatment formulators.
benefits: Multifunctional antiscalant
Effective iron oxide and particle dispersion
Corrosion inhibition properties

product_properties.description: Belclene 460 is an aqueous, non-phosphorus, carboxylic copolymer offering excellent multifunctional properties for scale and corrosion water treatment programs.
applications: Stabilization of calcium phosphate and zinc
Calcium sulfate and oxalate scale prevention
benefits: Halogen stable, strong dispersant
Good thermal stability
Effective over a wide pH range

product_properties.description: Belclene 500 provides a highly effective mild steel corrosion inhibitor and a strong building block for zinc-based cooling water programs.
applications: Building block for zinc-based corrosion inhibitor formulations
Effective in moderate hardness and soft waters
benefits: Effective in presence of dissolved iron
Stable in any system water at any pH

product_properties.description: Belclene 640 provides calcium carbonate and iron oxide deposit control for formulators who prefer phosphonate-based programs.
benefits: Good zinc and phosphate stabilization
Good mild steel corrosion protection
Inexpensive method to control deposition
